Name: Hovership Havoc
About the game: Hovership Havoc is a sci-fi twin stick shooter with 3rd person boss battles. Blast through rooms of a futuristic robotic factory filled with robot enemies. Equip your Hovership with randomly dropped abilities and upgrade your stats during and before each playthrough. Top Down Action Third Person Boss Battles Randomly generated levels with 100s of combinations of rooms and enemy spawn patterns to ensure no two playthroughs are ever the same 4 playable Hoverships, each with their own unique main weapon and stats for completely different play styles Giant robotic boss battles that take place in a 3rd person perspective instead of top down 30+ Hovership sci-fi abilities such as nanobots, drones, missiles, lasers, shields, and more 15+ Robotic enemy types with their own attack styles and AI Collect ORBs to upgrade your hovership stats and abilities Permanent progression for each hovership between playthroughs Supports keyboard and mouse or controller input 3 Different futuristic sci-fi robotic factory environments
